title: What are the important chapter or chapters which have more weightage in class 11 final exam in physics, chemistry, and math? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sorry but i will cross question you regarding it, First, define important topic ? what is an important topic actually mean ? According to me an important topic is something which is fundamental block for my future needs, means if there is something that will be neccessary for me in future i will call it important. so, if you have same definition then lets start to know what are important topics ? PHYSICSMotion in plane, laws of motion, system of particles & Rotation, gravitation, wavesCHEMISTRTYChemical bonding, thermodynamics , equilibrium, redox, GOC and hydrocarbonsMATHSFunctions, Trigonometry , straight lines and conic sections, complex no.THat’s it.Best of LUck !!!
